summary: Health bars?  Where we're going, we don't need...health bars.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][b][b][b][center][youtube]YpTy5CbuLzI[/youtube][/center][/b]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37216-1-1430053788.png[/img][/b][/b]



[size=15]IMPORTANT INFORMATION OVERHAUL[/b][/center][/size]

[size=5][center]AN [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52487/?]EPIC GAMEPLAY OVERHAUL[/url] MOD[/center][/size]



[center][center][youtube]EyJKt3J3EDo[/youtube][/center][/center]



[center][b][size=4]THIS MOD REQUIRES SKSE, SKYUI, AND THE LATEST SKYRIM UPDATE.[/size][/b][/center]


[center][size=4]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32597/?]Dragon Combat Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37216/?]Civil War Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43241/?]Fire and Ice Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52474/?]Combat Drama Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52471/?]Important Information Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53888/?]Epic Music Overhaul
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58051/?]Simple Magic Overhaul
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/edit/?id=60077][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60077/?]Movement and Stamina Overhaul[/url]
[/size][/center]




[b][size=5]INSTALLATION NOTES[/size][/b]

DO NOTHING OTHER THAN THIS.

Install with or without mod manager. Profit.

IF YOU ARE UNINSTALLING

If you update midsave, use the console to remove and then add the spell "IIO ability" to the player.


[b][size=5]APOLLO'S OBJECTIVE MOD ASSESSMENT[/size][/b]

Script weight.........................Low
Installation Difficulty...............Low
Modding Skill Level Required......Low
Game Difficulty Increase...........Low




[b][size=5]TABLE OF CONTENTS[/size][/b]

I. Features
II. I still don't understand. What is this and what does it do?
III. Known issues and Incompatibilities
IV. Frequently Asked Questions
V. Reviews
VI. Recommended Mods
VII. Glowing Testimonials
VIII. Shameless Advertising for My Buddies



[size=3]

[i]"You know when they have a fishing show on TV? They catch the fish and then let it go. They don't want to eat the fish, they just want to make it late for something."

~ Mitch Hedberg
[/i][/size]

[center][size=8][color=green]TL;DR[/color][/SIZE][/center]

[size=3][b][center]OG IMMERSIVELY FULL OF KNOWLEDGE.[/center][/b][/size]


[b][size=5]GETTIN' HIGH ON INFORMATION[/size][/b]
You no longer need a HUD. As your stamina drains, the world will blur, and your vision will start to double. You will [i]feel[/i] magicka drain from you as all color and life drains from the world. And when your health drops, your vision will become dark and red and you will know you are about to die.

Essentially, your percent of health/magicka/stamina remaining is now represented by imagespace modifiers that seamlessly blend together to give you the information you need without those awful immersion-breaking health/magicka/stamina bars.

THIS MOD DOES NOT GET RID OF THOSE BARS. You will need a mod like Immersive HUD to do that.

[b][size=5]MCMS EVERYWHERE[/size][/b]
Yup, IIO is a member of the EGO family, and as such, features a MCM. This MCM lets you control the threshold at which the modifiers will take effect(don't worry, they won't just "pop in" unless you have them set really really low, they will still seamlessly blend).


[img]http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lcvf36M7zC1qa54hvo1_500.gif[/img]



[b][size=5]I STILL DON'T UNDERSTAND - WHAT IS THIS AND WHAT DOES IT DO?[/size][/b]

Seriously?


[b][size=5]KNOWN ISSUES/INCOMPATIBILITIES[/size][/b]

Please visit [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52487/?]the EGO bug tracker[/url] for a list of all known issues and incompatibilities associated with this mod.




[b][size=5]FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS[/size][/b]

"Your description sucks."
Don't be Toby. You're better than that.


[youtube]iPLd_SSkxoE[/youtube]



"Why is the description so short? That's my favorite part of your mods!"
Um, this is a relatively simple concept, people. Not much I can say. AWOOGA AWOOGA AWOOGA. Ok, I can say that.



[b][size=5]REVIEWS[/size][/b]

[youtube]on0_go6yzrM[/youtube] [youtube]GUUHaMs87cM[/youtube]



[b][size=5]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/b]

These mods carry my highest recommendation. They have been thoroughly tested in my game, and I guarantee they will work with all of my mods.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/336241/?]Anything by LifesToRock[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191/?]Anything by EnaiSiaion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1614960/?]Anything by 3jiou[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3841389/?]Anything by tktk1[/url]
[url=http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/category/news/]Anything by Erkeil[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiHair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1002/?]Jaysus Swords[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916/?]Lanterns of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24445/?]SPERG[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3222912/?]Any of Immersive Sounds[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30947/?]Dead Body Collision[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12977/?]Immersive Patrols[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18799/?]Radiant Potions and Poisons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26017/?]Destructible Bottles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22745/?]Footprints[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33482/?]MinimalHUD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10251/?]Silverlight Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40216/?]Stormlord Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292/?]Unique Uniques[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40491/?]Revenge of the Enemies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15599/?]Fortified Dawnstar[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17168/?]Skyrim Bigger Trees[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49036/?]Immersive First Person[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41634/?]DVA[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717/?]Better Vampires[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14353/?]Improved Dragon Shouts[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10906/?]Dance of Death[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/?]WATER[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19718/?]Bloody Facials[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17214/?]No Spinning Death Animation[/url]

We will always remember our fallen brother, Cabbage in a Pot. Rest well, sweet prince.



[b][size=5]GLOWING TESTIMONIALS[/size][/b]

"I'm colorblind, jerk." - My buddy Ells when he sees this.

"I like this. I'm going to smash my face against my mouse until I click the endorse button." - Fishbiter. He amuses me.



[b][size=5]SHAMELESS ADVERTISING FOR MY FRIENDS[/size][/b]

Millions of pageviews, guys; I gotta do something with it. Help me make these guys famous.


[center][i][size=6][color=red]Driver Friendly![/color][/size]
(Screaming and taking off your bra is optional, but recommended)[/i]

[youtube]ppx0CghRedE[/youtube] [youtube]MOrAic-vuoM[/youtube][/center]

files.name: Important Information Overhaul
files.changelogHtml: The Stamina threshold now operates correctly in the MCM.
